item.title: Fondant au Chocolat
item.description: Indulge in the rich, velvety goodness of this classic Fondant au Chocolat, where each bite reveals a luscious molten center. Perfect for chocolate lovers, this dessert is sure to impress at any gathering.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 12 minutes

â° Total Time: 27 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 200g dark chocolate
  • 150g butter
  • 150g sugar
  • 4 eggs
  • 50g flour

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Melt the dark chocolate and butter together in a heatproof bowl over simmering water.
  2. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and sugar until pale and fluffy.
  3. Incorporate the melted chocolate mixture into the egg mixture, then gently fold in the flour.
  4. Pour the batter into greased ramekins and bake at 180Â°C for 12 minutes for a gooey center.
